snippet: Gov. Tom Corbett said Wednesday that he has agreed to release $45 million for the Philadelphia schools.
abstract: Pennsylvania Gov Tom Corbett says he has agreed to release $45 million for Philadelphia schools as the district goes through its worst financial crisis in memory and questions swirl about a student's apparent asthma-related death after attending a school without a nurse on site.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Tom Corbett said Wednesday that he has agreed to release $45 million for the Philadelphia schools.

headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: State Will Release School Funds
